participant_1.background:
To free my mind from feeling depressed i look up at the stars at night.
I cannot choose between lollipops and rainbows.
I hate cleaning up after my husband and children.
I believe in aliens.
I would love to be a professional eater and not get fat.

participant_2.background:
I am a widow.
My parents were divorced.
I grew up with 6 siblings.
I ve broken my arm twice.

content.text: Hi! I'm feeling a little down today, so I'm looking up at the stars to clear my mind. What do you do to de-stress?
Hi! I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling down. I usually like to go for a walk, or read a book, or watch a movie to de-stress.
I've never been much of a reader, but I do like to watch movies. What's your favorite movie?
It's hard to choose just one, but I'd have to say The Shawshank Redemption is my favorite movie of all time.
I've heard great things about that movie! I've been meaning to watch it, but I haven't gotten around to it yet.
You should definitely watch it! It's a really good movie.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome! So, what do you do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, go for walks, and read books.
That sounds like fun! I like to spend time with my family and friends too. We go on a lot of trips together.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to go on a trip with my family, but we've never had the time.
You should definitely make time for it! It's a lot of fun and you get to spend quality time with your family.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
